title: Fork, "Silhouette Viande", ca. 1930
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Integral construction. Four tines and rectangular shouldered bowl. Shaft tapers inward and widens into handle of elongated oval shape with molded pattern of four overlapping panels interlocked at handle end and with plain reverse in center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, "Silhouette Viande", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. silver plate. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1993-150-14.
